definition: to comply in order to please others/to accommodate sb else's taste/to make fun of
to gather together, pool or collect/to happen by chance/to move close to/to exploit an opportunity

sentences.english: His reception however was of the most flattering kind.
sentences.chinese: 不外人家倒很湊趣地歡迎了他。

sentences.english: Everyone in this company knows that he"s trying to curry favor with the board of the directors."
sentences.chinese: 公司裏的每一小我都知道他想要湊趣董事會。
